item.title: Update request to Tina Churchman from the U.S. Securities & Exchange Commission
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-02-08_1939_0800_Re_FOIA_Request_23-00030-FOPA-Request_for_identification_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Re: FOIA Request 23-00030-FOPA - Request for identification Date sent: February 8, 2023, 19:39 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Tina Churchman (U.S. Securities & Exchange Commission), Securities & Exchange Commission Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-02-08_1939_0800_Re_FOIA_Request_23-00030-FOPA-Request_for_identification_Redacted.pdf Dear Ms. Churchman, If and only if I am not mistaken, I never heard from the SEC since I submitted my request which â€œwas changed from a Freedom of Information Act request (23-00270-FOIA) to a Freedom of Information Act /Privacy Act request and assigned a new number (23-00030-FOPA).
